list.name: Mary Jones
list.tweet: Elasticsearch means full text search has never been so easy

list.name: John Smith
list.tweet: @mary it is not just text, it does everything

list.name: Mary Jones
list.tweet: However did I manage before Elasticsearch?

list.name: John Smith
list.tweet: The Elasticsearch API is really easy to use

list.name: Mary Jones
list.tweet: The Query DSL is really powerful and flexible

list.name: John Smith
list.tweet: Elasticsearch surely is one of the hottest new NoSQL products

list.name: Mary Jones
list.tweet: Elasticsearch is built for the cloud, easy to scale

list.name: John Smith
list.tweet: Elasticsearch and I have left the honeymoon stage, and I still love her.

list.name: Mary Jones
list.tweet: So yes, I am an Elasticsearch fanboy

list.name: John Smith
list.tweet: How many more cheesy tweets do I have to write?
